thread.title: BRIEF-Bio Rad Laboratories Says KPMG Notified Senior Management It Required More Time To Complete Audit Of 2017 Financial Statements

title: BRIEF-Bio Rad Laboratories Says KPMG Notified Senior Management It Required More Time To Complete Audit Of 2017 Financial Statements

organizations.name: min read   bio rad laboratories inc
time to complete audit of 2017 financial statements reuters

text: Market News  45 AM / in 8 minutes BRIEF-Bio Rad Laboratories Says KPMG Notified Senior Management It Required More Time To Complete Audit Of 2017 Financial Statements Reuters Staff 1 Min Read   Bio Rad Laboratories Inc: * BIO RAD LABORATORIES - KPMG NOTIFIED SENIOR MANAGEMENT IT REQUIRED MORE TIME TO COMPLETE AUDIT OF 2017 FINANCIAL STATEMENTS - SEC FILING * BIO RAD LABORATORIES SAYS UNABLE TO FILE 2017 FORM 10-K BY EXTENDED FILING DEADLINE OF MARCH 16 * BIO RAD LABORATORIES SAYS IDENTIFIED CERTAIN INTERNAL CONTROL DEFICIENCIES ARISING FROM APRIL 2017 ERP SYSTEM & BUSINESS STRUCTURE CONVERSION * BIO RAD LABORATORIES - CONCLUDED THAT INTERNAL CONTROL OVER FINANCIAL REPORTING WAS NOT EFFECTIVE AS OF DEC 31, 2017 Source text: ( bit.ly/2Iv0YzY ) Further company coverage:
